entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403002}If you don't have enough consumable{F801}items, check out the shop underground{F801}here. The Ashura-kai run it.{F801}{F802}The selection's not bad, since it's{F801}an official Ashura-kai thing. The people{F801}of Tokyo can hardly live without it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403042}It hasn't been made public, but now{F801}that Tayama is dead, the Ashura-kai{F801}is practically defunct.{F801}{F802}But the shops they used to run in each{F801}district are still around.{F801}{F802}You can never have enough consumable{F801}items, you know? Thank God for those{F801}shops...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403042}It hasn't been made public, but now{F801}that Tayama is dead, the Ashura-kai{F801}is practically defunct.{F801}{F802}But the shops they used to run in each{F801}district are still around.{F801}{F802}You can never have enough consumable{F801}items, you know? Thank God for those{F801}shops...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403041}The demons want to decide on a champion?{F801}Now? In this mess?{F801}{F802}...I guess this isn't the time to start{F801}freaking out...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403002}It hasn't been made public, but now{F801}that Tayama is dead, the Ashura-kai{F801}is practically defunct.{F801}{F802}But the shops they used to run in each{F801}district are still around.{F801}{F802}If the angels are coming from up top{F801}to attack like I heard, we'll need{F801}those consumable items real soon...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403001}Even though the Demon Lord was defeated,{F801}there's still demons running around.{F801}{F802}Thank God the shops the Ashura-kai used{F801}to run in each district are still open.{F801}{F802}Tayama wasn't such a great guy, but he{F801}did leave some nice things behind...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403001}Even though the Demon Lord was defeated,{F801}there's still demons running around.{F801}{F802}Thank God the shops the Ashura-kai used{F801}to run in each district are still open.{F801}{F802}Tayama wasn't such a great guy, but he{F801}did leave some nice things behind...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demure woman\0{F87A,61}{F813,1,403312}What? Questions? Why don't you ask{F801}a Hunter?{F801}{F802}I got no time to waste on some{F801}strangers. Just go to the Hunter{F801}Association over there and ask them.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demure woman\0{F87A,61}{F813,1,403312}These days, I can't help but wonder...{F801}{F802}When my kid grows up to be your age,{F801}what's Tokyo gonna look like then?{F801}{F802}And will I still be alive to look{F801}after him...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demure woman\0{F87A,61}{F813,1,403312}These days, I can't help but wonder...{F801}{F802}When my kid grows up to be your age,{F801}what's Tokyo gonna look like then?{F801}{F802}And will I still be alive to look{F801}after him...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demure woman\0{F87A,61}{F813,1,403312}By the way... I don't see that girl from{F801}the Central Underground District so much{F801}these days...{F801}{F802}She used to play with my kid. She's a{F801}real nice girl. Smart, too.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demure woman\0{F87A,61}{F813,1,403312}By the way... I don't see that girl from{F801}the Central Underground District so much{F801}these days...{F801}{F802}She used to play with my kid. She's a{F801}real nice girl. Smart, too.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demure boy\0{F87A,55}{F813,1,404021}No! I won't run! I'm gonna beat all{F801}the demons for you!{F801}{F802}I'll be as great as {F843,0} and{F801}beat them all up!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demure boy\0{F87A,55}{F813,1,404021}No! I won't run! I'm gonna beat all{F801}the demons for you!{F801}{F802}I'll be as great as {F843,0} and{F801}beat them all up!{F801}
